description:
Gracious Amber Keen invites two of her best friends, Dia Zeva and Kristine, to her isolated cabin in Tahoe for a ski week. Things don't go as planned when Dia gets them all thrown off the mountain for getting caught fucking herself on the ski lift. Now that they can't ski they must find alternate ways to entertain themselves.
Amber and Dia immediately get cozy with a home video of Amber getting fucked on The Casting Couch. After watching they decide to invite more guests to join them. Amber makes a quick call to Lochai, asking him to come to the cabin and to bring his toys. Soon all are getting comfortable, and fucked!
Watch what happens when 4 horny woman are snowbound with a perverted rigger...
Part 1 to be continued
title: Tahoe: Exiled from Dick Mountain pt 1
